tags.tag_message:
Complete 4-phase repository migration to ZFS

This release marks the completion of the full migration pipeline:
- Phase 0: Initial migration from snap to BTRFS snapshots
- Phase 1: Unicode normalization (NFD to NFC) on BTRFS COW
- Phase 2: Migration from BTRFS to ZFS with DSG metadata
- Phase 3: Tag preservation and migration completion

Data has been successfully migrated from the original snap system,
through BTRFS with Unicode normalization, to ZFS with full DSG
integration and preserved version history.
